TestInformation.Title: Unvanquished
TestInformation.Description: Unvanquished is a modern fork of the Tremulous first person shooter. Unvanquished is powered by the Daemon engine, a combination of the ioquake3 engine with the graphically-beautiful XreaL engine. Unvanquished supports a modern OpenGL 3 renderer and other advanced graphics features for this open-source game.

Default.Arguments: +exec pts +timedemo 1 +set demodone "quit" +set demoloop1 "demo pts1; set nextdemo vstr demodone" +vstr demoloop1 +set r_fullscreen 1 +set com_speeds 1
